page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelcard getpanelid method

argument.name: part
argument.description: The part of the panel to get the ID for. Values can be "header", "body", "footer" or "overlay".

return.name: id
return.description: The id of the panel or panel part.

page.description: Get the ID of the panel, or one of its sub-parts.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class var headerID = pObj.getPanelId('header'); // get the ID of the header of the panel
